[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
RECIBO DE PAGO DE NOMINA
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HTML Personalizado", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% set EMPLOYEE = frappe.get_doc('Employee',doc.employee) %}
Fecha de Impresion: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.today(), 'dd-MM-YYYY') }}
Desde: {{doc.get_formatted("start_date")}} Hasta: {{doc.get_formatted("end_date")}} Número: {{doc.name}}
Empleado: {{EMPLOYEE.employee_name}} Cédula de Identidad: {{EMPLOYEE.dni}}
Código: {{EMPLOYEE.name}} Cargo: {{EMPLOYEE.designation}} Fecha de Ingreso: {{EMPLOYEE.get_formatted("date_of_joining")}}
Salario Mensual: {%- for earning in doc.earnings -%} {%- if earning.salary_component == 'Salario Quincenal' -%} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( (earning.amount * 2 ) , currency = 'USD', precision = 2) }} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Earnings & Deductions"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HTML Personalizado", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% set nn = namespace(row_class=0) %} {% set deduccion = namespace(deduccion_amount=0) %} {%- for row in doc.earnings -%} {%- if row.salary_component != 'Bono Salarial' -%} {%- else -%} {% set nn.row_class = row.amount %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.deductions -%} {%- for row in doc.deductions -%} {%- if row.salary_component != 'Abono Prestamo' -%} {%- else -%} {% set deduccion.deduccion_amount = row.amount %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Descripción Asignación Deducción
{{ row.salary_component}} {{row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{ row.salary_component}} {{row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
Totales: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( (doc.gross_pay-nn.row_class ), currency = 'USD', precision = 2) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(( doc.total_deduction - deduccion.deduccion_amount ) , currency = 'USD', precision = 2 ) }}

Total Neto a Cobrar: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( (doc.net_pay-nn.row_class+deduccion.deduccion_amount), currency = 'USD', precision = 2) }}
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Firma"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HTML Personalizado", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Recibe Conforme:
Firma: ____________________ C.I.: ____________________ Fecha: ____________________
"}]

format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
RECIBO DE PAGO DE NOMINA
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HTML Personalizado", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% set EMPLOYEE = frappe.get_doc('Employee',doc.employee) %} {% set exchange = frappe.get_all('Currency Exchange', filters={'date': '2022-02-15'}, fields=['exchange_rate' ], order_by='date desc') %}
Fecha de Impresion: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.today(), 'dd-MM-YYYY') }}
Desde: {{doc.get_formatted("start_date")}} Hasta: {{doc.get_formatted("end_date")}} Número: {{doc.name}}
Empleado: {{EMPLOYEE.employee_name}} Cédula de Identidad: {{EMPLOYEE.dni}}
Código: {{EMPLOYEE.name}} Cargo: {{EMPLOYEE.designation}} Fecha de Ingreso: {{EMPLOYEE.get_formatted("date_of_joining")}}
Salario Mensual: {%- for earning in doc.earnings -%} {%- if earning.salary_component == 'Salario Quincenal' -%} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( (earning.amount * exchange[0].exchange_rate * 2 ) , currency = 'VEF', precision = 2) }} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Earnings & Deductions"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HTML Personalizado", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% set nn = namespace(row_class=0) %} {% set exchange = frappe.get_all('Currency Exchange', filters={'date': '2022-02-15'}, fields=['exchange_rate' ], order_by='date desc') %} {% set deduccion = namespace(deduccion_amount=0) %} {%- for row in doc.earnings -%} {%- if row.salary_component != 'Bono Salarial' -%} {%- else -%} {% set nn.row_class = row.amount %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.deductions -%} {%- for row in doc.deductions -%} {%- if row.salary_component != 'Abono Prestamo' -%} {%- else -%} {% set deduccion.deduccion_amount = row.amount %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Descripción Asignación Deducción
{{ row.salary_component}} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( ( row.amount * exchange[0].exchange_rate ) , currency = 'VEF', precision = 2) }}
{{ row.salary_component}} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( ( row.amount * exchange[0].exchange_rate ) , currency = 'VEF', precision = 2) }}
Totales: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( ((doc.gross_pay-nn.row_class)* exchange[0].exchange_rate ), currency = 'VEF', precision = 2) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( ( (doc.total_deduction - deduccion.deduccion_amount) * exchange[0].exchange_rate ) , currency = 'VEF', precision = 2) }}
{% set exchange = frappe.get_all('Currency Exchange', filters={'date': '2022-02-15'}, fields=['exchange_rate' ], order_by='date desc') %}
Total Neto a Cobrar: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( ( (doc.net_pay-nn.row_class+deduccion.deduccion_amount) * exchange[0].exchange_rate ) , currency = 'VEF', precision = 2) }}
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Firma"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HTML Personalizado", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Recibe Conforme:
Firma: ____________________ C.I.: ____________________ Fecha: ____________________
"}]
